p: To James A. Felps Jailor of Saint Louis County Greeting:

You are hereby commanded to have the body of George Washington Kirk before the Law Commissioners Court of Saint Louis County forth with together with the time & cause of his detention by now to do and receive what shall then and there be adjudged concerning said George Washington Kirk whom alleged in the annexed petition is illegally restrained of his liberty by you and have you then & there this writ with your return thereon.
Given under my hand and the deal of said Court at office in Saint Louis this 11th day of August 1856
